Class CameraEditor

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      jpo.CameraEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class CameraEditor
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

This class creates a JFrame and then presents the user with the dialog to add pictures directly from the camera.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

CameraEditor

public CameraEditor()
Creates a JFrame with the GUI elements and buttons that can start and stop the reconciliation. The reconciliation itself runs in it's own Thread.
